com.ibm.collaboration.realtime.telephony.sut.phonebook.external
Interface PhoneBookExternal

All Known Implementing Classes:
PhoneBookExternalImpl
public interface PhoneBookExternal

External interface to manipulate contacts with in Phonebook. This interface supports CRUD operations with in phonebook.

Field Summary

          Number type is Conference
static java.lang.String TYPE_H323

Method Summary
 void createContact(Contact contact)
          This API adds the contact to existing contact list .
 java.util.List<Contact> getAllContacts()
          Returns list of all contacts from phonebook
 Contact getContactForNumber(PhoneNumber pbn)
          Returns the first contact from phonebook matches with given phone number.
 java.util.List<Contact> getContactsByName(java.lang.String name)
          Returns all contacts from phonebook find by name.
 java.util.List<Contact> getContactsByNameAndCompany(java.lang.String name, java.lang.String company)
          Returns list of contacts from contacts with matching name and company name
 boolean removeContact(Contact contact)
          This API will remove the contact from the phonebook list.
 boolean updateContact(Contact oldContact, Contact newContact)
          updates existing contact by new contact

Method Detail

createContact

void createContact(Contact contact)
                   throws InvalidContactException
This API adds the contact to existing contact list . A contact is said to be same if it has same contactId & communityId. If the contact is same it will update the existing contact.

Parameters:
contact -
Throws:
InvalidContactException
